title: Faking
description: A man turns up in Accident and Emergency with a dead woman who he claims to know nothing about. Arrested, he calls his work colleague who witnesses his death whilst he is under interrogation. Designer drugs are thought to be the cause but his work colleague, charged with dealing with the ensuing scandal as they all worked in a Public Department discovers there is a lot more to the deaths than originally thought.The more she uncovers, the stranger the truth becomes and the more deadly the threats to the staff in the office.
author: Felicity Lennie
